actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use or expenditure of Federal funds for the conversion of weather information to the metric system without a direct authorization by the Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits the use or expenditure of Federal funds for the conversion of weather information to the metric system without a direct authorization by the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use or expenditure of Federal funds for the conversion of weather information to the metric system without a direct authorization by the Congress.
